other.property: 'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),2)'

'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),3)'

'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none' or type4 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),4)'

'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none' or type4 in 'none' or type5 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),5)'

'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none' or type4 in 'none' or type5 in 'none' or type6 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),6)'

propertyGroup.name: widgetSmall
propertyGroup.property: 'true' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else 'false'
'true' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else 'false'

'248' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '265' if aspect in 'square' else '218' if aspect in 'landscape' else '300'
'265.71' if aspect in 'square' else '372' if aspect in 'landscape' else '206.66'

'' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else 'diffuse/rounded5-290x290.png' if aspect in 'square' else 'diffuse/rounded5-445x250.png' if aspect in 'landscape' else 'diffuse/rounded5-212x319.png'

'32,14,14,14' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '15,31,15,17' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else '10'
'WidgetPosterInfoContainer' if type in 'sysinfo' and art in 'poster' else 'WidgetFanartInfoContainer' if type in 'sysinfo' and art in 'fanart' else 'WidgetContainer'

propertyGroup.name: widgetMedium
propertyGroup.property: 'true' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else 'false'
'true' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else 'false'

'290' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '310' if aspect in 'square' else '270' if aspect in 'landscape' else '339'
'310' if aspect in 'square' else '465' if aspect in 'landscape' else '232.5'

'' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else 'diffuse/rounded5-290x290.png' if aspect in 'square' else 'diffuse/rounded5-445x250.png' if aspect in 'landscape' else 'diffuse/rounded5-212x319.png'

'35,14,14,14' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '16,33,16,17' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else '10'
'WidgetPosterInfoContainer' if (type in 'sysinfo' or 'weather') and art in 'icon' else 'WidgetFanartInfoContainer' if (type in 'sysinfo' or 'weather') and art in 'fanart' else 'WidgetContainer'

propertyGroup.name: widgetBig
propertyGroup.property: 'true' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else 'false'
'true' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else 'false'

'346' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '372' if aspect in 'square' else '357' if aspect in 'landscape' else '388'
'372' if aspect in 'square' else '620' if aspect in 'landscape' else '265.71'

'' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else 'diffuse/rounded5-290x290.png' if aspect in 'square' else 'diffuse/rounded5-445x250.png' if aspect in 'landscape' else 'diffuse/rounded5-212x319.png'

'39,14,14,14' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'square' and casemusic in 'true' else '16,36,16,18' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'poster' and aspect in 'portrait' and casevideo in 'true' else '10'
'WidgetPosterInfoContainer' if type in 'sysinfo' and art in 'poster' else 'WidgetFanartInfoContainer' if type in 'sysinfo' and art in 'fanart' else 'WidgetContainer'
